title: Spinach, bacon and avocado salad
ingredients: ['250g spinach leaves', '1 avocado', '2 hard boiled eggs, sliced into 8ths', '3 tablespoons French dressing', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '175g bacon, rind removed, sliced into strips', '1 small clove garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '250g croutons']
